rules_text:
Whenever Six-Strike Mantid deals combat damage to a player, if it has deathtouch, vigilance, and menace, draw that many cards.
{G}{G}: Teach Six-Strike Mantid deathtouch. [i](Put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that ability, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
{G}{U}: Teach Six-Strike Mantid vigilance.
{U}{U}: Teach Six-Strike Mantid menace.
